components.title: About Us
components.subtitle: Leading to the Top in the Esports World
components.description: At AIM Agency, we work for the success of our players and teams with years of experience in the esports sector.

components.mainContent: AIM Agency was founded in 2020 to provide professional services in the esports world. Since our establishment, we have been working for the success of our players and teams, contributing to the development of the esports sector.

sections.title: Our Mission
sections.content: To raise professional standards in the esports world, maximize the potential of our players, and ensure the success of our teams in national and international arenas.

sections.title: Our Vision
sections.content: To become Turkey's and the region's most reliable esports agency, have a say in the global esports ecosystem, and lead the spread of esports culture.

sections.title: Our Values
sections.content: Transparency, professionalism, continuous development, and player-focused approach form our core values. The success of each of our players is our success.
